entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. This call may be recorded for quality assurance. How can I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return something. It's the VeloBand Pulse I ordered last week. It's not working like I expected.
Okay, I can help you with that. Can I get your order number or the email address associated with the order?
Thank you. One moment while I pull up your order. Okay, I see the VeloBand Pulse here. When did you receive the item?
Uh, I think it was, like, the 5th of the month. Maybe the 6th?

Okay, I see that your VeloBand Pulse was delivered on the 5th. Unfortunately, our return window is 10 days from the delivery date. Since today is the 20th, it appears you are outside of that return window.
What? That's ridiculous! I just got it! I want to return it. It's faulty! I need a refund.

I understand your frustration, and I apologize for any inconvenience. While I can't process a full refund due to being outside of the return window, I can offer you a store credit for the purchase price of the VeloBand Pulse. Would that be acceptable?
Store credit? Seriously? I wanted my money back! This thing doesn't even work properly. It's giving me completely wrong readings!

I understand. While a policy exception for a full refund isn't possible, I can assure you that the store credit will allow you to choose a replacement or another item from our extensive catalog that better suits your needs. Plus, it doesn't expire. The VeloBand Pulse is designed to provide accurate readings, and any discrepancies may be due to incorrect fitting or placement. A different model might be a better fit.
Ugh, fine. Store credit. But if the next thing I get from you guys is junk, I'm done shopping with you.
I understand. I can process that store credit for you right now. Would you like me to email it to the same address on file, [customer's email address]?
Okay, the store credit is now being processed and will be sent to [customer's email address] within the next few minutes. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
You're very welcome. Thank you for contacting VeloFit. Have a great day!
Wait, actually, thanks. I appreciate you working with me on this. I'll check my email now.
